Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People care a lot about the recent Australian Budget and we can tell by how they're talking about it on social media. They're happy about the $300M in energy-efficiency investments and pleased with Labor's plans to protect Medicare. However others worry that more funds should be allotted to JobSeeker and redirected from stage 3 tax cuts for wealthy men. Overall Australians are eager to share their opinions with their representatives and make their voices heard.
